item.title: Ask-EHR
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: ASK-EHR Throughout March 1-2 2025, I was in a team of 12 to create a streamlined search directory with AI chatbot features. Nikunj created the idea, then attracted us into the project. Then, he split the team into story use cases, backend coding, frontend coding and testing and presentation. I was assigned as vice manager, checking the progress of the programme and the presentation. In the end, we made a working prototype, that I taught them all HuggingFace and a London person taught me Streamlit, and this was the results.
